short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify vacation tracking and management with Timeout. Stay informed with live updates and optimize your paid time off balance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wondering how many paid vacation days you have left this year? With Timeout, you'll always know in just one click! Discover the quickest and easiest way to manage your vacation days with Timeout, your ultimate vacation day tracker.

––– Key Features –––

★ Quick Overview:
Get a comprehensive snapshot of your vacation days. See what's remaining and how they're allocated, enabling you to plan with confidence.

★ Effortless Vacation Tracking:
Log your vacation days with ease, from dreams to reality, in just a few clicks.

★ Smart Vacation Management:
Effortlessly track your vacations by type, including Ongoing Trips, Upcoming Plans, Dream Spots, and Past Memories.

★ Flexible Time Off Setup:
Customise your Annual Quota, Saved Days, and Bonus Days, for precise control and management of your time off.

★ Live Updates While Editing:
See your vacation balance instantly adjust as you log your trips, keeping you in the loop.

––– Vacation Tracking Made Simple –––

With Timeout – Vacation Day Tracker, you'll never miss a moment to relax and recharge. Take control of your time off management with our easy to use time off tracker.
